doc:
Dave Hill (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dave_Hill_(actor) 0 David Hill (born 15 October 1945) is a British actor. He was born in Skipton, West Riding of Yorkshire. He attended Ermysted's Grammar School for boys in Skipton. He has appeared in The Full Monty as well as many other TV series and films. He is best known for playing Bert Atkinson in EastEnders from 2006 to 2007 and in 2017. David_Hill ( born_15_October_1945 ) is a_British_actor . He was_born in Skipton , West_Riding of Yorkshire . He attended Ermysted 's_Grammar_School for boys in Skipton . He has_appeared in The_Full_Monty as_well as many_other_TV_series_and_films . He is_best_known for playing Bert_Atkinson in EastEnders from 2006 to 2007 and in 2017 .
